title: Thai beef with coconut
ingredients: ['3 shallots', '2 garlic cloves', '2cm piece of fresh root ginger', '2 tbsp sunflower oil', '500g lean minced steak', '1 tbsp red curry paste', '1 tbsp fish sauce', '1 tbsp dark soy sauce', '2-3 dried kaffir lime leaves', '100ml beef stock', '3 tbsp coconut cream', 'grated coconut', 'chopped fresh coriander']
